description: This table stores billing activity history action-specific data. Every time a billing activity (ATM) is performed on a record or group of records, an activity history record (BFH) is logged. These activity history records store specific data related to each action that was performed on the activity. Each action (and its related data) is logged as a line in related group BFH 300. This table is specifically for actions performed on insurance follow-up (BDC) records.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action category ID for this row in the billing activity history. The other data in this row represent specific values associated with this action performed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries:

columns.name: ACT_BDC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence record status category ID that is set as a result of this action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Created


Transferred


Reopened


Completed


Voided

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RESOLVE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence record resolution reason category ID that is set as a result of this action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Auto-Closed


No Outstanding Insurance Balance 


Claim Resubmitted


PB Charges Voided


PB Charges Reposted


PB Payment Undistributed


PB Original Follow-up Completed

columns.name: ACT_BDC_OWNING_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence record owning area category ID that is set as a result of this action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_BDC_DENIAL_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the category ID of the denial record denial category that is set as a result of this action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Adjudication


Registration/Eligibility


Authorization


Coding


Bundled

Non-Covered


Miscellaneous


Timely Filing

Provider Enrollment/Credentialing

Additional Documentation Needed


Billing Error


Coordination of Benefits


Denied Days

Patient Responsible

columns.name: ACT_BDC_ROOT_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence record root cause category ID that is set as a result of this action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RPT_REMIT_CODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record reporting remittance code ID that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RPT_REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_SOURCE_AREA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence source area category ID that is set as a result of this action.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACT_BDC_OWNING_AREA_C_NAME

columns.name: ACT_BDC_PREVENTABLE_YN
columns.description:
This column stores the denial record preventable status that is set as a result of this action. 'Y' indicates that the denial was preventable. 'N' or NULL indicate that it was not preventable.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial appeal stage (I BDC 10130).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Stage 1


Stage 2


Stage 3

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_DUE_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the denial appeal due date (I BDC 10022).

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the denial appealing user (I BDC 10027).

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_SUBMIT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the denial appeal submission date (I BDC 10023).

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_SUBMIT_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial appeal submission method (I BDC 10028).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Payer Website


Fax


Mail


Resubmitted Claim


Other

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RES_OWNER_USER_ID
columns.description: The column represents the resolution owner for the follow-up records.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_SOURCE_USER_ID
columns.description: The column represents the caused by user for the follow-up records.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_SOURCE_DEPT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the caused-by department for the follow-up records.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_SELECT_LN_YN
columns.description:
The column indicates whether denial resubmission had a manually-selected line.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACT_BDC_PREVENTABLE_YN

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_OVRIDE_DATA_YN
columns.description:
The column indicates whether resubmitted lines had override data.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACT_BDC_PREVENTABLE_YN

columns.name: ACT_BDC_NEXT_FOLLOWUP_DATE
columns.description: The Next Follow-up Date that was changed as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_APPEAL_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The appeal level set as a result of this action.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Level 1


Level 2


Level 3
